akn:section.akn:heading: Home repair services grants for older and disabled homeowners

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general The Secretary shall make available a model program to provide home repair services for older homeowners and disabled homeowners, including such services as the examination of homes, repair services, and follow-up to ensure the continued effectiveness of the repairs provided.
